page.title: 08Our Headmistress
page.content: Mrs.Greatorex has been the headmistress of Morton School for over thirteen years.Her first job was as an infant teacher at South County Infant School in Gainsborough.Mrs.Greatorex started writing a book about Morton in January 1983 and finished it in the October and it was put in the shops in April 1984.She built her book up round local people's photographs and stories.It is called "Reflections on the Life and History of Morton,by Gainsborough,Lincolnshire".Mrs. Greatorex does some gardening in her spare time.Her favourite hobby is knitting and her favourite sport is tennis.She is now working on a new book about the village of Springthorpe.
